00049         abstract public static function GetInstance ( );
00050         // User's manual :
00051     //Getter of the unique instance. Create this if doesn't exist
00052         //Must call parent::getInstance( ) in the code with the given name
00053         //of the class : __CLASS__

00104     // Mode d'emploi :
00105     //
00106     // Contrat :
00107     //
00108         
00109     protected static function getThis ( $class )
00110     // User's manual :
00111     //Getter of the unique instance of the class named $class. 
00112         //Create this if doesn't exist
00113         //
00114     // Contract :
00115     //
00116         {
00117                 if ( !IsSet ( self::$instance ) || ! IsSet ( self::$instance[ $class ] ) )
00118                 // instance creation
00119                 {
00120                         self::$instance[ $class ] = new $class(); 
00121                 }
00122 
00123                 return self::$instance[ $class ];
00124         } // End of getThis
00125
